messages.subject: "End of Year Reports" sent in to schools, for life learners
messages.msgSnippet: Realised my earlier post should be titled end of year reporting for life learners, for that is the ball I wish to toss in for volleying in this grand court. I
messages.messageBody:
Realised my earlier post should be titled end of year reporting for life
learners, for that is the ball I wish to toss in for volleying in this
grand court.

I am reading, so as to gain confidence and return to the higher mindset,
away from fear of authorities and establishments and order, on to the
truth of what we are doing by learning and living in a different way.

Comparing apples to frogs, it is, and so I must write, but in a fear
place it is hard to wax eloquent about our learning. I need to get
quiet, be still, and feel and think, and I do appreciate that
encoragement typed here, to think, to get quiet.

I do feel I am an observer and a responder and an advocate for my
family. To summarise our "learning progress" is on my plate to do.
